ygData.subject: RE: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: this is not a flame :) What do ppl really expect?  when I got EQ I was amazed that it d been out a week or 2 and there weren t any trainers for it yet.  I m
ygData.messageBody:
this is not a flame :)

What do ppl really expect? when I got EQ I was amazed that it'd been out a
week or 2 and there weren't any trainers for it yet. I'm still amazed that
there aren't any. Congrats to whoever is doing security there they deserve
it.

But there are ppl that want big cheats. There are ppl that want a new
challange, a new hard game to make a cheat program for. There are ppl that
have ideas on how to do stuff. You get a list like this one the topic is
cheats, a lot of us have a decient amount of computer, networking, hacking,
encryption experance of course you're going to have ideas on how to get
around EQ security if someone brings it up.

Yes, this may make EQ trainerable, but it may not. I'm sure anything
current will change by the expansion that's due out this christmas (or
after, can't remember).

Omeg who isn't sure if he wants anything to come of it or not anymore...oh
well, it's fun to brainstorm stuff.

>That's way cool and highly feasible. Haven't tried it myself, although you
>may have just opened up the possibility of a very big >cheat - a "trainer"
>utility that uses this idea.
